message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Time is ticking, and it hurts us both.
Okay, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. Let's split it 80/20 in my favor.  Remember, the longer we wait, the less valuable this money becomes for both of us.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this now.  Don't let greed make us both losers.
